translated: “I did not give you a throne,
I see this as a mistake.”

analyzed: na iva abhisajjāmi na ca api kuppe
na ca api me appiyam asi kiñci
translated: and nothing was displeasing to me;
But I did have this thought,
“This is the custom in our family,
A seat, water, and a foot stool,
all this we offer to guests.
This is the custom in our family,
as if to a most excellent relative.”🔽The Throne Birth Story is the seventh.
